resources.string: Working with BimmerGestalt AAIdrive, this app shows your Home Assistant dashboards in your BMW or MINI IDrive infotainment system.
Enter your Home Assistant server to connect and get started
You can star up to 4 dashboards to show directly in the main screen in your car.
No custom dashboards found, please create a custom dashboard in Home Assistant. The automatic dashboards can\'t be shown in the car.
